title: Typoholism.com
content:
[typoholism.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020223835/http:/www.typoholism.com/) is a site I just created to diagnose the symptoms of typoholics.

it's actually a twitter app that searches for the hashtag #typoholism and posts it on the site. just post a tweet with that hashtag and it will appear on the site

some examples:  
taking pictures of comic sans menus in fancy restaurants  
if you plan on picking your child's name based on how easy it is to kern  
Obsessive use of the Baskerville ampersand

Anyways, I thought everyone here might enjoy this little app
author: mattmc

comments.content: Well done, sir. I applaud you guys in taking up the task of your podcast. It's actually not half bad.

Thanks so much Paul. We're hoping to keep getting better, get some guests on, fix the audio issues, and hopefully continue expand our design and type knowledge so we can have more interesting conversations.
